verbs.description: [ARG0: Xi Jinping] [V: heaped] [ARG1: praise] [ARG2: on Kim Jong - un] [ARGM-TMP: on Tuesday] [ARG2: for his summit with President Trump last week] , [ARGM-ADV: saying he is dedicated to improving relations between China and North Korea] .
